title: schemas
content: # `prefect.server.api.ui.schemas` ## Functions ### `validate_obj` ```python theme={null} validate_obj(json_schema: dict[str, Any] = Body(..., embed=True, alias='schema', validation_alias='schema', json_schema_extra={'additionalProperties': True}), values: dict[str, Any] = Body(..., embed=True, json_schema_extra={'additionalProperties': True}), db: PrefectDBInterface = Depends(provide_database_interface)) -> SchemaValuesValidationResponse ```
